text: Edin Mujčin (born 14 January 1970) is a Bosnian former footballer. Mujčin moved to Croatia during the Bosnian War. Mujčin spent most of his career with Croatian team Dinamo Zagreb, winning several national titles and appearing in both UEFA Champions League and UEFA Cup. He spent his last two seasons at NK Kamen Ingrad in the Croatian first division, before retiring from professional football following their relegation in 2007.
